blocks.name: gsumws3
blocks.content: Valuation of a length 3 word in a monoid. (Contributed by Stanislas Polu, 9-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumws3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))), wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cs3(c1, c3, c4)), co(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, cs3(c1, c3, c4)), co(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c0, cgsu, co(cs1(c1), cconcat, cs2(c3, c4))), co(co(c0, cgsu, cs1(c1)), c5, co(c0, cgsu, cs2(c3, c4))), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))))
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, cs3(c1, c3, c4), co(cs1(c1), cconcat, cs2(c3, c4)), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))), wceq(cs3(c1, c3, c4), co(cs1(c1), cconcat, cs2(c3, c4))))
  s1s2(c1, c3, c4)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))), wceq(co(c0, cgsu, co(cs1(c1), cconcat, cs2(c3, c4))), co(co(c0, cgsu, cs1(c1)), c5, co(c0, cgsu, cs2(c3, c4)))), wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cs1(c1), cword(c2)), wcel(cs2(c3, c4), cword(c2)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  s1cld(c1, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))))
  simprl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))
  s2cld(c3, c4, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))))
  simprrl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simprrr(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  gsumccat(c0, cs1(c1), c2, cs2(c3, c4), c5)
  oveq12d(co(c0, cgsu, cs1(c1)), c5, co(c0, cgsu, cs2(c3, c4)), c1, co(c3, c5, c4), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))))
  ad2antrl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cs1(c1)), c1))
  gsumws1(c1, c2, c0)
  adantrl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cs2(c3, c4)), co(c3, c5, c4)))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cs2(c3, c4)), co(c3, c5, c4)))
  gsumws2(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5)
}

blocks.name: gsumws4
blocks.content: Valuation of a length 4 word in a monoid. (Contributed by Stanislas Polu, 10-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumws4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))))), wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cs4(c1, c3, c4, c5)), co(c1, c6, co(c3, c6, co(c4, c6, c5)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, cs4(c1, c3, c4, c5)), co(c1, c6, co(c3, c6, co(c4, c6, c5))), co(c0, cgsu, co(cs1(c1), cconcat, cs3(c3, c4, c5))), co(co(c0, cgsu, cs1(c1)), c6, co(c0, cgsu, cs3(c3, c4, c5))), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))))))
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, cs4(c1, c3, c4, c5), co(cs1(c1), cconcat, cs3(c3, c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))))), wceq(cs4(c1, c3, c4, c5), co(cs1(c1), cconcat, cs3(c3, c4, c5))))
  s1s3(c1, c3, c4, c5)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))))), wceq(co(c0, cgsu, co(cs1(c1), cconcat, cs3(c3, c4, c5))), co(co(c0, cgsu, cs1(c1)), c6, co(c0, cgsu, cs3(c3, c4, c5)))), wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cs1(c1), cword(c2)), wcel(cs3(c3, c4, c5), cword(c2)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))))
  s1cld(c1, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))))))
  simprl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))))
  s3cld(c3, c4, c5, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))))))
  simprrl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))), wcel(c4, c2))
  simprrl(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2)))), wcel(c5, c2))
  simprrr(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))
  gsumccat(c0, cs1(c1), c2, cs3(c3, c4, c5), c6)
  oveq12d(co(c0, cgsu, cs1(c1)), c6, co(c0, cgsu, cs3(c3, c4, c5)), c1, co(c3, c6, co(c4, c6, c5)), wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))))))
  ad2antrl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cs1(c1)), c1))
  gsumws1(c1, c2, c0)
  adantrl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c2))), wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cs3(c3, c4, c5)), co(c3, c6, co(c4, c6, c5))))
  gsumws3(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c6)
}

blocks.name: amgm2d
blocks.content: Arithmetic-geometric mean inequality for ` n = 2 ` , derived from ~ amgmlem . (Contributed by Stanislas Polu, 8-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm amgm2d(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cle, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))
} = {
  3brtr3d(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cle, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cdiv, nat2), co(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cgsu, cs2(c0, c1)), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat2)))), co(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cs2(c0, c1)), cdiv, cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat2))), w0)
  amgmlem(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cs2(c0, c1), co(nat0, cfzo, nat2), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(nat0, cfzo, nat2), cfn))
  fzofi(nat0, nat2)
  a1i(w0, wne(co(nat0, cfzo, nat2), emptycls))
  ne0ii(co(nat0, cfzo, nat2), nat0)
  mpbir(wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cfzo, nat2)), wcel(nat2, cn))
  2nn()
  lbfzo0(nat2)
  syl(w0, wf(cs2(c0, c1), co(nat0, cfzo, nat2), crp), wcel(cs2(c0, c1), cword(crp)))
  s2cld(c0, c1, crp, w0)
  sylibr(wcel(cs2(c0, c1), cword(crp)), wf(cs2(c0, c1), co(nat0, cfzo, nat2), crp), wf(cs2(c0, c1), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c1))), crp))
  wrdf(cs2(c0, c1), crp)
  feq2i(cs2(c0, c1), co(nat0, cfzo, nat2), crp, co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c1))))
  oveq2i(nat0, cfzo, nat2, cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c1)))
  eqcomi(nat2, cfv(chash, cs2(c0, c1)))
  s2len(c0, c1)
  oveq12d(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cgsu, cs2(c0, c1)), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat2))), co(c0, cmul, c1), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cgsu, cs2(c0, c1)), co(c0, cmul, c1)), wcel(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cmnd), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  mp1i(w0, wcel(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cmnd), wcel(ccnfld, crg))
  ringmgp(ccnfld, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  gsumws2(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), c0, cc, c1, cmul)
  mgpbas(cc, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), ccnfld)
  mgpplusg(cmul, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), ccnfld)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  cnfldmul()
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat2)), nat2, w0)
  oveq12d(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cs2(c0, c1)), cdiv, cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat2)), co(c0, caddc, c1), nat2, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cs2(c0, c1)), co(c0, caddc, c1)), wcel(ccnfld, cmnd), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  mp1i(w0, wcel(ccnfld, cmnd), wcel(ccnfld, crg))
  cnring()
  ringmnd(ccnfld)
  rpcnd(c0, w0)
  rpcnd(c1, w0)
  gsumws2(ccnfld, c0, cc, c1, caddc)
  cnfldbas()
  cnfldadd()
  mp1i(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat2)), nat2), wcel(nat2, cn0))
  2nn0()
  hashfzo0(nat2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm amgm2d(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[×]c1)[^c](1[÷]2))[≤]((c0[+]c1)[÷]2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ+)
} = {
  3brtr3d(((c0[×]c1)[^c](1[÷]2)), cle, ((c0[+]c1)[÷]2), (((mulGrp ` CCfld)[gsum]<" c0 . c1 ">)[^c](1[÷](# `(0[..^]2)))), ((CCfld[gsum]<" c0 . c1 ">)[÷](# `(0[..^]2))), w0)
  amgmlem((mulGrp ` CCfld), <" c0 . c1 ">, (0[..^]2), w0)
  a1i(w0, (0[..^]2)∈ Fin)
  fzofi(nat0, nat2)
  a1i(w0, (0[..^]2)≠ ∅)
  ne0ii((0[..^]2), nat0)
  mpbir(0 ∈(0[..^]2), 2 ∈ ℕ)
  2nn()
  lbfzo0(nat2)
  syl(w0, (<" c0 . c1 "> :(0[..^]2)→ ℝ+), <" c0 . c1 "> ∈ Word(ℝ+))
  s2cld(c0, c1, crp, w0)
  sylibr(<" c0 . c1 "> ∈ Word(ℝ+), (<" c0 . c1 "> :(0[..^]2)→ ℝ+), (<" c0 . c1 "> :(0[..^](# ` <" c0 . c1 ">))→ ℝ+))
  wrdf(<" c0 . c1 ">, crp)
  feq2i(<" c0 . c1 ">, (0[..^]2), crp, (0[..^](# ` <" c0 . c1 ">)))
  oveq2i(nat0, cfzo, nat2, (# ` <" c0 . c1 ">))
  eqcomi(nat2, (# ` <" c0 . c1 ">))
  s2len(c0, c1)
  oveq12d(((mulGrp ` CCfld)[gsum]<" c0 . c1 ">), ccxp, (1[÷](# `(0[..^]2))), (c0[×]c1), (1[÷]2), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[gsum]<" c0 . c1 ">)=(c0[×]c1), (mulGrp ` CCfld)∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  mp1i(w0, (mulGrp ` CCfld)∈ Mnd, CCfld ∈ Ring)
  ringmgp(ccnfld, (mulGrp ` CCfld))
  gsumws2((mulGrp ` CCfld), c0, cc, c1, cmul)
  mgpbas(cc, (mulGrp ` CCfld), ccnfld)
  mgpplusg(cmul, (mulGrp ` CCfld), ccnfld)
  eqid((mulGrp ` CCfld))
  cnfldmul()
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, (# `(0[..^]2)), nat2, w0)
  oveq12d((CCfld[gsum]<" c0 . c1 ">), cdiv, (# `(0[..^]2)), (c0[+]c1), nat2, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (CCfld[gsum]<" c0 . c1 ">)=(c0[+]c1), CCfld ∈ Mnd, c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  mp1i(w0, CCfld ∈ Mnd, CCfld ∈ Ring)
  cnring()
  ringmnd(ccnfld)
  rpcnd(c0, w0)
  rpcnd(c1, w0)
  gsumws2(ccnfld, c0, cc, c1, caddc)
  cnfldbas()
  cnfldadd()
  mp1i(w0, (# `(0[..^]2))= 2, 2 ∈ ℕ0)
  2nn0()
  hashfzo0(nat2)
}

blocks.name: amgm3d
blocks.content: Arithmetic-geometric mean inequality for ` n = 3 ` . (Contributed by Stanislas Polu, 11-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm amgm3d(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, c2)), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, nat3)), cle, co(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c2)), cdiv, nat3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crp))
} = {
  3brtr3d(co(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, c2)), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, nat3)), cle, co(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c2)), cdiv, nat3), co(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cgsu, cs3(c0, c1, c2)), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)))), co(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cs3(c0, c1, c2)), cdiv, cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3))), w0)
  amgmlem(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, nat3), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(nat0, cfzo, nat3), cfn))
  fzofi(nat0, nat3)
  mp1i(w0, wne(co(nat0, cfzo, nat3), emptycls), wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)))
  mpbir(wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)), wcel(nat3, cn))
  3nn()
  lbfzo0(nat3)
  ne0i(nat0, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3))
  syl(w0, wf(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, nat3), crp), wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cword(crp)))
  s3cld(c0, c1, c2, crp, w0)
  sylibr(wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cword(crp)), wf(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, nat3), crp), wf(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, co(nat2, caddc, nat1)), crp))
  sylib(wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cword(crp)), wf(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, co(nat2, caddc, nat1)), crp), wf(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs3(c0, c1, c2))), crp))
  wrdf(cs3(c0, c1, c2), crp)
  feq2i(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs3(c0, c1, c2))), crp, co(nat0, cfzo, co(nat2, caddc, nat1)))
  oveq2i(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs3(c0, c1, c2)), co(nat2, caddc, nat1))
  eqtri(cfv(chash, cs3(c0, c1, c2)), co(nat2, caddc, nat1), nat3)
  s3len(c0, c1, c2)
  feq2i(cs3(c0, c1, c2), co(nat0, cfzo, nat3), crp, co(nat0, cfzo, co(nat2, caddc, nat1)))
  oveq2i(nat0, cfzo, nat3, co(nat2, caddc, nat1))
  df-3()
  oveq12d(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cgsu, cs3(c0, c1, c2)), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3))), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(nat1, cdiv, nat3), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cgsu, cs3(c0, c1, c2)), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, c2))), wcel(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cmnd), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))))
  mp1i(w0, wcel(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cmnd), wcel(ccnfld, crg))
  ringmgp(ccnfld, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  gsumws3(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), c0, cc, c1, c2, cmul)
  mgpbas(cc, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), ccnfld)
  mgpplusg(cmul, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), ccnfld)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  cnfldmul()
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)), nat3, w0)
  oveq12d(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cs3(c0, c1, c2)), cdiv, cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c2)), nat3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cs3(c0, c1, c2)), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, c2))), wcel(ccnfld, cmnd), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))))
  mp1i(w0, wcel(ccnfld, cmnd), wcel(ccnfld, crg))
  cnring()
  ringmnd(ccnfld)
  jca32(w0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  rpcnd(c0, w0)
  rpcnd(c1, w0)
  rpcnd(c2, w0)
  gsumws3(ccnfld, c0, cc, c1, c2, caddc)
  cnfldbas()
  cnfldadd()
  mp1i(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat3)), nat3), wcel(nat3, cn0))
  3nn0()
  hashfzo0(nat3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm amgm3d(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[×](c1[×]c2))[^c](1[÷]3))[≤]((c0[+](c1[+]c2))[÷]3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ+)
} = {
  3brtr3d(((c0[×](c1[×]c2))[^c](1[÷]3)), cle, ((c0[+](c1[+]c2))[÷]3), (((mulGrp ` CCfld)[gsum]<" c0 . c1 . c2 ">)[^c](1[÷](# `(0[..^]3)))), ((CCfld[gsum]<" c0 . c1 . c2 ">)[÷](# `(0[..^]3))), w0)
  amgmlem((mulGrp ` CCfld), <" c0 . c1 . c2 ">, (0[..^]3), w0)
  a1i(w0, (0[..^]3)∈ Fin)
  fzofi(nat0, nat3)
  mp1i(w0, (0[..^]3)≠ ∅, 0 ∈(0[..^]3))
  mpbir(0 ∈(0[..^]3), 3 ∈ ℕ)
  3nn()
  lbfzo0(nat3)
  ne0i(nat0, (0[..^]3))
  syl(w0, (<" c0 . c1 . c2 "> :(0[..^]3)→ ℝ+), <" c0 . c1 . c2 "> ∈ Word(ℝ+))
  s3cld(c0, c1, c2, crp, w0)
  sylibr(<" c0 . c1 . c2 "> ∈ Word(ℝ+), (<" c0 . c1 . c2 "> :(0[..^]3)→ ℝ+), (<" c0 . c1 . c2 "> :(0[..^](2[+]1))→ ℝ+))
  sylib(<" c0 . c1 . c2 "> ∈ Word(ℝ+), (<" c0 . c1 . c2 "> :(0[..^](2[+]1))→ ℝ+), (<" c0 . c1 . c2 "> :(0[..^](# ` <" c0 . c1 . c2 ">))→ ℝ+))
  wrdf(<" c0 . c1 . c2 ">, crp)
  feq2i(<" c0 . c1 . c2 ">, (0[..^](# ` <" c0 . c1 . c2 ">)), crp, (0[..^](2[+]1)))
  oveq2i(nat0, cfzo, (# ` <" c0 . c1 . c2 ">), (2[+]1))
  eqtri((# ` <" c0 . c1 . c2 ">), (2[+]1), nat3)
  s3len(c0, c1, c2)
  feq2i(<" c0 . c1 . c2 ">, (0[..^]3), crp, (0[..^](2[+]1)))
  oveq2i(nat0, cfzo, nat3, (2[+]1))
  df-3()
  oveq12d(((mulGrp ` CCfld)[gsum]<" c0 . c1 . c2 ">), ccxp, (1[÷](# `(0[..^]3))), (c0[×](c1[×]c2)), (1[÷]3), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[gsum]<" c0 . c1 . c2 ">)=(c0[×](c1[×]c2)), (mulGrp ` CCfld)∈ Mnd, (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ∈ ℂ)))
  mp1i(w0, (mulGrp ` CCfld)∈ Mnd, CCfld ∈ Ring)
  ringmgp(ccnfld, (mulGrp ` CCfld))
  gsumws3((mulGrp ` CCfld), c0, cc, c1, c2, cmul)
  mgpbas(cc, (mulGrp ` CCfld), ccnfld)
  mgpplusg(cmul, (mulGrp ` CCfld), ccnfld)
  eqid((mulGrp ` CCfld))
  cnfldmul()
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, (# `(0[..^]3)), nat3, w0)
  oveq12d((CCfld[gsum]<" c0 . c1 . c2 ">), cdiv, (# `(0[..^]3)), (c0[+](c1[+]c2)), nat3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (CCfld[gsum]<" c0 . c1 . c2 ">)=(c0[+](c1[+]c2)), CCfld ∈ Mnd, (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ∈ ℂ)))
  mp1i(w0, CCfld ∈ Mnd, CCfld ∈ Ring)
  cnring()
  ringmnd(ccnfld)
  jca32(w0, c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  rpcnd(c0, w0)
  rpcnd(c1, w0)
  rpcnd(c2, w0)
  gsumws3(ccnfld, c0, cc, c1, c2, caddc)
  cnfldbas()
  cnfldadd()
  mp1i(w0, (# `(0[..^]3))= 3, 3 ∈ ℕ0)
  3nn0()
  hashfzo0(nat3)
}

blocks.name: amgm4d
blocks.content: Arithmetic-geometric mean inequality for ` n = 4 ` . (Contributed by Stanislas Polu, 11-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm amgm4d(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, nat4)), cle, co(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c2, caddc, c3))), cdiv, nat4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, crp))
} = {
  3brtr3d(co(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, nat4)), cle, co(co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c2, caddc, c3))), cdiv, nat4), co(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cgsu, cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3)), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat4)))), co(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3)), cdiv, cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat4))), w0)
  amgmlem(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3), co(nat0, cfzo, nat4), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(co(nat0, cfzo, nat4), cfn))
  fzofi(nat0, nat4)
  mp1i(w0, wne(co(nat0, cfzo, nat4), emptycls), wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cfzo, nat4)))
  mpbir(wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cfzo, nat4)), wcel(nat4, cn))
  4nn()
  lbfzo0(nat4)
  ne0i(nat0, co(nat0, cfzo, nat4))
  mpbid(w0, wf(cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3), co(nat0, cfzo, nat4), crp), wf(cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3))), crp))
  syl(w0, wf(cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3))), crp), wcel(cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3), cword(crp)))
  s4cld(c0, c1, c2, c3, crp, w0)
  wrdf(cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3), crp)
  feq2d(cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3))), crp, co(nat0, cfzo, nat4), w0)
  oveq2d(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3)), nat4, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3)), nat4))
  s4len(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  oveq12d(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cgsu, cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3)), ccxp, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat4))), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3))), co(nat1, cdiv, nat4), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cgsu, cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3)), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cmul, c3)))), wcel(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cmnd), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)))))
  mp1i(w0, wcel(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cmnd), wcel(ccnfld, crg))
  ringmgp(ccnfld, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  gsumws4(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), c0, cc, c1, c2, c3, cmul)
  mgpbas(cc, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), ccnfld)
  mgpplusg(cmul, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), ccnfld)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld))
  cnfldmul()
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat4)), nat4, w0)
  oveq12d(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3)), cdiv, cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat4)), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c2, caddc, c3))), nat4, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3)), co(c0, caddc, co(c1, caddc, co(c2, caddc, c3)))), wcel(ccnfld, cmnd), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)))))
  mp1i(w0, wcel(ccnfld, cmnd), wcel(ccnfld, crg))
  cnring()
  ringmnd(ccnfld)
  jca32(w0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)))
  rpcnd(c0, w0)
  rpcnd(c1, w0)
  jca(w0, wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))
  rpcnd(c2, w0)
  rpcnd(c3, w0)
  gsumws4(ccnfld, c0, cc, c1, c2, c3, caddc)
  cnfldbas()
  cnfldadd()
  mp1i(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, co(nat0, cfzo, nat4)), nat4), wcel(nat4, cn0))
  4nn0()
  hashfzo0(nat4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm amgm4d(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[×](c1[×](c2[×]c3)))[^c](1[÷]4))[≤]((c0[+](c1[+](c2[+]c3)))[÷]4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℝ+)
} = {
  3brtr3d(((c0[×](c1[×](c2[×]c3)))[^c](1[÷]4)), cle, ((c0[+](c1[+](c2[+]c3)))[÷]4), (((mulGrp ` CCfld)[gsum]<" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 ">)[^c](1[÷](# `(0[..^]4)))), ((CCfld[gsum]<" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 ">)[÷](# `(0[..^]4))), w0)
  amgmlem((mulGrp ` CCfld), <" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 ">, (0[..^]4), w0)
  a1i(w0, (0[..^]4)∈ Fin)
  fzofi(nat0, nat4)
  mp1i(w0, (0[..^]4)≠ ∅, 0 ∈(0[..^]4))
  mpbir(0 ∈(0[..^]4), 4 ∈ ℕ)
  4nn()
  lbfzo0(nat4)
  ne0i(nat0, (0[..^]4))
  mpbid(w0, (<" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 "> :(0[..^]4)→ ℝ+), (<" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 "> :(0[..^](# ` <" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 ">))→ ℝ+))
  syl(w0, (<" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 "> :(0[..^](# ` <" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 ">))→ ℝ+), <" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 "> ∈ Word(ℝ+))
  s4cld(c0, c1, c2, c3, crp, w0)
  wrdf(<" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 ">, crp)
  feq2d(<" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 ">, (0[..^](# ` <" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 ">)), crp, (0[..^]4), w0)
  oveq2d(nat0, cfzo, (# ` <" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 ">), nat4, w0)
  a1i(w0, (# ` <" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 ">)= 4)
  s4len(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  oveq12d(((mulGrp ` CCfld)[gsum]<" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 ">), ccxp, (1[÷](# `(0[..^]4))), (c0[×](c1[×](c2[×]c3))), (1[÷]4), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((mulGrp ` CCfld)[gsum]<" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 ">)=(c0[×](c1[×](c2[×]c3))), (mulGrp ` CCfld)∈ Mnd, (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(c2 ∈ ℂ ∧ c3 ∈ ℂ))))
  mp1i(w0, (mulGrp ` CCfld)∈ Mnd, CCfld ∈ Ring)
  ringmgp(ccnfld, (mulGrp ` CCfld))
  gsumws4((mulGrp ` CCfld), c0, cc, c1, c2, c3, cmul)
  mgpbas(cc, (mulGrp ` CCfld), ccnfld)
  mgpplusg(cmul, (mulGrp ` CCfld), ccnfld)
  eqid((mulGrp ` CCfld))
  cnfldmul()
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, (# `(0[..^]4)), nat4, w0)
  oveq12d((CCfld[gsum]<" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 ">), cdiv, (# `(0[..^]4)), (c0[+](c1[+](c2[+]c3))), nat4, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (CCfld[gsum]<" c0 . c1 . c2 . c3 ">)=(c0[+](c1[+](c2[+]c3))), CCfld ∈ Mnd, (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(c2 ∈ ℂ ∧ c3 ∈ ℂ))))
  mp1i(w0, CCfld ∈ Mnd, CCfld ∈ Ring)
  cnring()
  ringmnd(ccnfld)
  jca32(w0, c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, (c2 ∈ ℂ ∧ c3 ∈ ℂ))
  rpcnd(c0, w0)
  rpcnd(c1, w0)
  jca(w0, c2 ∈ ℂ, c3 ∈ ℂ)
  rpcnd(c2, w0)
  rpcnd(c3, w0)
  gsumws4(ccnfld, c0, cc, c1, c2, c3, caddc)
  cnfldbas()
  cnfldadd()
  mp1i(w0, (# `(0[..^]4))= 4, 4 ∈ ℕ0)
  4nn0()
  hashfzo0(nat4)
}
